QuestData.Title: Meet the Queen
QuestData.Description:
$n, we need only one more piece to complete the Crest of Ascension.
Eons ago, our Crest was originally crafted with the assistance of the fae. Deep within Ardenweald lies a portal they maintain to ferry souls back to their worlds. It is a source of great power and the final key to rebuilding the Crest.
Seek out the Winter Queen in Ardenweald and plead our case. We've already sent Pelagos ahead as our envoy to arrange for your meeting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gain an audience with the Winter Queen at the Heart of the Forest in Ardenweald.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Willowblossom outside the Heart of the Forest.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Lord Herne at the Heart of the Forest
Listen to the Winter Queen's reply
Speak with Attendant Shimmerwing to exit the Heart of the Forest
